venue.address_2: Actual address is 550 but wrong on Google
venue.name: Seacoast Family YMCA

item.description:
I have reserved the Seacoast YMCA pool in Portsmouth NH for 3 Sundays in a row starting May 3rd from 4:30 - 7:30 pm. These kayak pool sessions will provide an opportunity for you to practice or learn safety skills and include bracing and rolling techniques. I'm also looking for experienced people to help with demonstrating and helping others learn these skills as well as monitor and assist. Cost is $25 per person based on a minimum of 12 people attending. I'd like to collect the money in advance to insure full attendance for each session. I'd also like to keep the number of people between 10 - 15 per session. Anyone who is experienced and would like to come to help others learn safety skills, assisted rescues or to brace and roll may attend free of charge.

Once again the dates are..
Sunday May 3rd
Sunday May 10th
Sunday May 17th

Please RSVP for each date to let me know which dates you'd like to attend and please send a check for $25 per session to my address below. Either write on the check or send a note with check indicating which date/dates you plan to attend. I'll be sending out more info as well as directions to those who sign-up.

Neil Sheehan
763 Ocean Boulevard
Hampton, NH 03842
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in parking lot 15 minutes before session begins
item.name: May 17 Kayaking Safety, Bracing & Rolling Skills - Portsmouth YMCA 4:30-7:30pm
